document.full_text: on a night the yankees struggled to score, reliever dave robertson turned a one-run deficit into three after a throwing error on a pickoff attempt in the sixth.
document.title: blue jays 5, yankees 3 : in position to put away blue jays, yankees throw away their chance
lines_and_colors: on a night the yankees struggled to score, reliever dave robertson turned a one-run deficit into three after a throwing error on a pickoff attempt in the sixth.
